DOC.detailed_description: Primary endpoint determine nutritional supplement decrease metabolic parameter triglyceride . Numerous study demonstrate efficacy fish oil reduce triglyceride subject take fish oil similar dos provide product ( see reference ) . Additional metabolic parameter measure secondary endpoint , include abdominal obesity , HDL cholesterol , blood pressure , fast glucose , haemoglobin A1c , skin glycation ( AGEs ) , pulse wave velocity , skin carotenoid , serum 25 ( OH ) D concentration , weight , LDL density , particle size number . The novel nutritional supplement contain many nutrient show improve metabolic parameter .
